name: BANG
description:
This is a realistic real life simulator where you can go to office, school, and various locations and talk with people and hang out.
Interested in playing a real life simulator. This game is for you


1. Walk around a various locations and interact NPCS in office, school and various other settings.
2. Ask different questions and chat
3. Meet Npc's and walk around.
4. Experience a 3d Realistic game in first person and enjoy the music.
